Title: Relates to a cap on security deposits for residential leases of one year or longer
Summary: Relates to a cap on security deposits for residential leases of at least one year to the equivalent of one-month's rent under the lease.
LawCode: Amd ยง7-103, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to a cap on security deposits for residential leases of one year or longer
